Add 2-, 4-, or 10-fold excess apyrase to the concentrated KIF1A solution,
Keep on ice for 30 min and
Centrifuge at 20,000 g to eliminate aggregates.
4. Mix the 2 μl apyrase-mixed KIF1A solution with 2 μl reservoir buffer, and
Dispense it in hanging drops over 500 μl
well solutions containing the reservoir buffer.
Reservoir buffer includes 29-31% \(w/v) PEG4000, 100 mM Tris-HCl pH 8.5, 200 mM sodium acetate, 1 mM NaN3, 1 mM DTT and 3% \(w/v) xylitol.
